pullRequest.title: Prevent loop in getValidation() due to -1 combo index

commit.message: Prevent loop in getValidation() due to -1 combo index

nodes.bodyText: This is not the correct fix because on line 464 in this method, we set the selected item and therefor selected index. If we stipulate that the selected index can only change if a prior selection has been made, keyboard input will not be able to move the selection in a non-editable combobox, which breaks a design intention (i.e. the intention is that, even in a non-editable combobox, a user should be able to begin typing a name and have the combobox scroll to the closest match; breaking that will be considered a regression).

commit.message: Narrow the scope of the no selection, -1, protection
